item.title: Foundation Models and the Future of Multi-Modal AI
item.description: Recent advances that combine large language and vision models can perform impressive tasks surprisingly well, and this direction holds a lot of promise for the future of AI

item.title: Neural nets are not "slightly conscious," and AI PR can do with less hype
item.description: Prominent AI researchers should take accurate science communication more seriously.

item.description: AI-powered robots are slowly taking over tedious tasks in warehouses, and it's just the beginning.

item.description: Embodied AI agents need data of interactions with the real world, which is far more difficult to get than data of other AI domains like vision and language.

item.description: What advances in hardware do we need to build intelligent robots of the future?

item.title: Why we don't have Robot Butlers yet
item.description: AI is necessary for autonomous robots of the future; its development and deployment is full of incredible challenges and promising opportunities.

item.title: How (not) to Fall Asleep
item.description: Here's a list and review of 20 things I've tried to help me fall asleep - some worked better than others. May be useful for those who also have trouble sleeping.
